corpus_versions.publication: The corpus version has already been published

comments: Four parallel files for two language pairs (es-ca and es-eu) and then three individual files for es, ca, and eu. The corpus has been automatically aligned, alignment average error rate is 2% (es-ca) and 15% (eu-es). Monolingual files have been normalized (@user and URLs are standarized to 'IDIDID' dnd 'URLURLURL', respectively)
